name: HOPUP1
description:
Inspired by a movement that was very popular in childhood, the characters controlled by players in the game can only be moved by jumping on one leg. 

In the game, two players need to occupy the central area of the scene, and the player who first achieved the occupation time wins. 

The player can push the opponent player down or push out the center area by adjusting the jumping angle.

Switching between offense and defense and maintaining the balance of one's own direction are the focus and difficulty of this game

 You have to bumping each other to make them fall while keeping yourself balance in order to win the match.

Game maker:

EastWindL,AAApan,Yating Wei, CharlieChiao
